verses.verse: "Most<WG281> certainly,<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> one who<WG3588> doesn't<WG3361> enter<WG1525> by<WG1223> the door<WG2374> into<WG1519> the sheep fold,<WG833> but<WG235> climbs up<WG305> some other way,<WG237> the same<WG1565> is<WG2076> a thief<WG2812> and<WG2532> a robber.<WG4263>

The thief<WG2812> <WG3756> only<WG1487> comes<WG2064> to<WG2443> steal,<WG2813> <WG2532> kill,<WG2380> and<WG2532> destroy.<WG622> I<WG1473> came<WG2064> that<WG2443> they may have<WG2192> life,<WG2222> and<WG2532> <WG2443> may have<WG2192> it abundantly.<WG4053>
I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the<WG4166> good<WG2570> shepherd.<WG4166> The<WG4166> good<WG2570> shepherd<WG4166> lays<WG5087> down his<WG846> life<WG5590> for<WG5228> the sheep.<WG4263>

He<WG1161> who is a hired hand,<WG3411> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> a shepherd,<WG4166> who<WG1526> doesn't<WG3739> own<WG2398> the sheep,<WG4263> sees<WG2334> the wolf<WG3074> coming,<WG2064> <WG2532> leaves<WG863> the sheep,<WG4263> and<WG2532> flees.<WG5343> The<WG2532> wolf<WG3074> snatches<WG726> the sheep,<WG3756> and<WG2532> scatters<WG4650> them.<WG846>

Therefore<WG1223> the<WG25> Father<WG3962> loves<WG25> me,<WG3165> because<WG3754> I<WG1473> lay down<WG5087> my<WG3450> life,<WG5590> that<WG2443> I may take<WG2983> it<WG846> again.<WG5124>

Many<WG1161> of them<WG4183> said,<WG3004> "He has<WG2192> a demon,<WG1140> and<WG2532> is insane!<WG3105> Why<WG5101> do you<WG191> listen to him?<WG1537>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "I told<WG2036> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> you don't<WG3756> believe.<WG4100> The works<WG2041> that<WG3739> I<WG1473> do<WG4160> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>'s name,<WG3686> these<WG5023> testify<WG3140> about<WG4012> me.<WG1700>

My<WG1699> sheep<WG4263> hear<WG5456> my<WG3450> voice,<WG191> and I<WG2504> know<WG1097> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> they follow<WG190> me.<WG3427>

I<WG2504> give<WG1325> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222> to them.<WG846> They<WG2532> will<WG622> never<WG3756> perish,<WG622> and no<WG3756> one<WG5100> will<WG726> snatch<WG726> them<WG846> out of<WG1537> my<WG3450> hand.<WG1519>

My<WG3450> Father,<WG3962> who<WG3739> has given<WG1325> them to me,<WG3427> is<WG2076> greater than<WG3187> all.<WG3956> <WG2532> No<WG3762> one is able to<WG1410> snatch<WG726> them out of<WG1537> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>'s hand.<WG5495>
I<WG1473> and<WG2532> the Father<WG3962> are<WG2070> one.<WG1520>"

do you<WG5210> say<WG3004> of<WG3004> him whom<WG3739> the Father<WG3962> sanctified<WG37> and<WG2532> sent<WG649> into<WG1519> the world,<WG2889> <WG987> 'You blaspheme,' because<WG3754> I said,<WG2036> <WG1510> 'I am the Son<WG5207> of God?<WG3754>'
